name: HappyPartyBear
description:
have fun at a party! don't let them know you are a man and don't let them upset.

trick - don't let overheat it reveal your secret.

controller 

move - arrow key 

z - take off the mask

x - entertain people at the party(keep close to them)

credit

music - Emerald Jak -Fishycuffs [title screen loop]
